page.title: 14Village life,Ravensthorpe
page.content: My name is Jeffrey I am 8 years old.I live in a village called Ravensthorpe. It is a nice place because I have lots of friends to play with.My street is called Church Gardens.I live there happily and comfortably.There are 5 in my family,their names are Mum,Dad,Helen Suzanne and me.I have the smallest bed- room in the house but I do not mind because it is just the right size for me.I have Mr.Men wallpaper in my room, also lots of toys.We have 2 cars- a Sunbeam and a Vauxhall Cavalier.We also have a cat,she has been naughty and killed one of the frogs in our pond.My sister has a hamster.He is very active and scampers all over you.I have a box of scalextric and a model train set.I like cuddly toys to comfort me in bed so I do not have nightmares.I like the country and do not want to live in the town.
